search_results.title: Jeremy R. Haft
search_results.snippet: Haft (born July 19, 1970) is an American author, teacher, and businessman. ... Haft was an adjunct professor at Georgetown University from 2011-2018.

search_results.title: Tim Haft: books, biography, latest update
search_results.snippet: Tim Haft was born in 1960 in Adrian, Michigan, but got bored rather quickly so moved his family to New York City in 1961.

search_results.title: Chris Haft (@goodforball) / X
search_results.snippet: I'm father to Samantha Allen & Stephanie Haft, veteran of covering MLB for nearly 30 years & author of 3 well-reviewed but rarely bought books on the SF Giants.
